item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, December 24, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. 38th Chaos Communication Congress (106 points | 32 comments)
2. The number pi has an evil twin (174 points | 62 comments)
3. Intel shareholders file case asking ex CEO, CFO to return 3 years of salary (46 points | 18 comments)
4. What happened to the world's largest tube TV? [video] (467 points | 221 comments)

7. Why are cancer guidelines stuck in PDFs? (162 points | 66 comments)

9. Demystifying Debuggers, Part 2: The Anatomy of a Running Program (89 points | 12 comments)
10. Paris to Berlin by train is now faster by five hours (29 points | 9 comments)
11. Threads of God (10 points | 6 comments)
12. Ask HN: Programmers who don't use autocomplete/LSP, how do you do it? (99 points | 225 comments)
13. Parsing millions of URLs per Second (2023) (101 points | 21 comments)
14. Symbolic Execution by Overloading __bool__ (33 points | 3 comments)

21. Show HN: Llama 3.3 70B Sparse Autoencoders with API access (167 points | 30 comments)
22. Xerox to acquire Lexmark (221 points | 196 comments)
23. WSDA, USDA announce eradication of northern giant hornet from the United States (148 points | 116 comments)
24. My Colleague Julius (306 points | 52 comments)
25. The Sean Carrolls Explain the Universe (16 points | 7 comments)
26. AI Decodes the Calls of the Wild (66 points | 16 comments)
27. Manx – a catalog of manuals for old computers (58 points | 12 comments)
28. Happy 400th birthday to the world’s oldest bond (294 points | 124 comments)
29. Show HN: Keypub.sh – OAuth for the terminal using SSH keys (178 points | 57 comments)
30. Spreadsheets 1/3 – Rye Language (57 points | 18 comments)
